amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funds for the Tenant-Based Rental Assistance program under the Public and Indian Housing section by $460,000,000.

action.text: Mr. Latham raised a point of order against the Nadler amendment (A022). Mr. Latham stated that the amendment sought a net increase of funding in the bill and was in violation of the Rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Nadler.
